articles.title: 'Small Axe' Named Best Picture by L.A. Film Critics Association - Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: Chadwick Boseman, Carey Mulligan, Glynn Turman and Youn Yuh-jung were among those winning acting prizes in the vote, which took place Sunday.
articles.content:
The Los Angeles Film Critics Association on Sunday determined their picks for the year's best in film.
